mapper.insert: INSERT INTO m_summary( mt_trend, ms_summary, ms_title, ms_url, history, insert_date, update_date, ms_status, ms_delete ) VALUES ( #{mtTrend}, #{msSummary}, #{msTitle}, #{msUrl}, #{history}, now(), now(), null, '0' )
mapper.delete: UPDATE m_summary SET ms_delete="1" WHERE history=#{history} AND ms_delete="0"
